attributes.action: Stop the closure of our community nursery in widnes
attributes.additional_details: Because there the only people that can the nursery’s are a key part in our community closure will mean parents cannot work and children cannot learn this will bring even more hardship to Widnes
attributes.background: I want the government to step in and stop the closure of our community nurseries

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

We think that you are referring to proposed closures of day care centres in Widnes. This decision appears to be the responsibility of Halton Borough Council, not the UK Government or Parliament.  

You could start a new petition calling for the UK Government to provide financial rescue packages for nurseries which are facing closure, if that's something that you'd like to see. 

You may also wish to sign some of the petitions we have open about childcare:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions?state=open&q=childcare
